answerText: Manaus[10] Manaus is the capital of the state named after this longest river of South America.  Its source is near Iquitos, Peru and it flows into the Atlantic Ocean.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | MIT A-Illinois B-Texas A&M A | 21 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question:  [10] Name this seventh most populous city of Brazil, the only 2014 World Cup Site to be situated in the rainforest.
